approveERC20(address,address,uint256).details: Only the authorized owner can approve token spending

returns.timeRemaining: Time remaining until inheritance can be claimed (0 if can claim)

returns.canExecute: Whether the transaction can be executed
returns.reason: The reason if transaction cannot be executed

cancelInheritance().details: Only the current owner can cancel inheritance.

claimOwnership().details: This function transfers the "authorized ownership" on-chain.

emergencyReset().details: Can only be called by the current authorized owner.

emergencyWithdraw(address).details: Allows the authorized owner to withdraw all ETH in emergency situations

params.to: The recipient address for the withdrawal

executeBatchTransactions(address[],uint2.details: Only the authorized owner can execute batch transactions

params.values: Array of ETH values to send

executeTransaction(address,uint256,bytes.details: Only the authorized owner can execute transactions

returns.returnData: The return data from the transaction

returns._0: The address of the current authorized owner

keepAlive().details: The owner calls this to prove they are still active.

setupInheritance(address,uint256).details: To be called by the EOA owner through an EIP-7702 transaction.

params._inactivityPeriod: The period of inactivity before inheritance can be claimed
params._inheritor: The address that will inherit the EOA

transferERC20(address,address,uint256).details: Only the authorized owner can transfer tokens

transferETH(address,uint256).details: Only the authorized owner can transfer ETH

approveERC20(address,address,uint256).notice: Approve ERC20 token spending from the EOA

canClaimInheritance().notice: Checks if inheritance can be claimed.

canExecuteTransaction(address,uint256).notice: Check if the EOA can execute a transaction

claimOwnership().notice: The inheritor claims ownership after the inactivity period.

emergencyReset().notice: Emergency reset function for edge cases.

executeBatchTransactions(address[],uint2.notice: Execute multiple transactions in a batch

executeTransaction(address,uint256,bytes.notice: Execute a transaction from the EOA

getERC20Balance(address).notice: Get the ERC20 token balance of the EOA

getETHBalance().notice: Get the ETH balance of the EOA

setupInheritance(address,uint256).notice: Sets up or updates the inheritance configuration.

transferERC20(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfer ERC20 tokens from the EOA
